price: (Zul-Qar’nain) kaa sε: “Obi a ͻbεyε bͻne no deε yεbεtwe n’aso ansa na (saa nipa no) asan akͻ ne Wura Nyankopͻn hͻ ama Ͻde asotwee a εyε hu atwe n’aso (bio).
arabic: قَالَ أَمَّا مَن ظَلَمَ فَسَوۡفَ نُعَذِّبُهُۥ ثُمَّ يُرَدُّ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِۦ فَيُعَذِّبُهُۥ عَذَابٗا نُّكۡرٗا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: qāla ammā man ẓalama fasawfa nuʿadhibuhu thumma yuraddu ilā rabbihi fayuʿadhibuhu ʿadhāban nuk'ran
